post.author: 관리자
post.content: Mediacorp Canada Inc. published its first issue of Canada Employment Weekly on January 8, 1993. Since this time, we have expanded and now publish a complete line of quality reference guides specializing in the employment field. Over one million copies of our guides have been sold in more than 30 countries, making us Canada's largest publisher of employment periodicals.
post.title: (취업 정보지) - Canada Employment Weekly
